definition: Jining district or Zhining raion of Ulaanchab city 烏蘭察布市|乌兰察布市[Wu1 lan2 cha2 bu4 shi4], Inner Mongolia
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning

sentences.english: Yesterday, the reporters went to the Jining district conducted by the Office of unannounced visits to several games.
sentences.chinese: 昨日，記者前往集寧區對幾家遊戲廳進行了暗訪。
